Description: Pottery lamp. Restored from many fragments. Dull, thin slip, brownish orange to reddish brown overall surviving on lower wall and around nozzle.
Acquisition notes: Acquired in Sousse. In reference to objects 2010,5009.1-34: 'They were acquired from various sources including shops in Kensington Church Street, Cecile Court and New Caledonian Market from about 1948 to 1962'.
